title: BRIEF-Canada's PM Trudeau pledges tax cut, lower cell phone bills if re-elected
text:
BRIEF-Canada's PM Trudeau pledges tax cut, lower cell phone bills if re-elected

Stock Markets 4 hours ago (Sep 23, 2019 05:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Canada's PM Trudeau pledges tax cut, lower cell phone bills if re-elected Sept 22 (Reuters) - Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says: * IF HE IS RE-ELECTED, THE FIRST C$15,000 CANADIANS EARN EACH YEAR WILL BE TAX FREE, UP FROM C$12,000 NOW * HE WILL CUT CELL PHONE COSTS BY 25% OVER FOUR YEARS IF RE-ELECTED Further company coverage: BCE.TO
